book.title: The Manoeuvring Mother Vol. I.
book.description: 简介： Sir John and Lady Wetheral were blessed with four fine little girls, who promised to be all the fond heart of a parent could wish; for, as her ladyship observed with pride, their forms were perfect, and their features were faultless. There was no exu...
